title: ** 370 BEDFORD AVE ** Spacious 1 BR
posting_body: ["One month's broker fee", 'September 1st move in date', 'Text Lihi @ 3477484234 w/ the address 370 Bedford', 'Pre-War apartment has true two bedrooms on opposite ends, not sharing the same wall but no living/dining space, so you would need to use one of the rooms as a separate living room!', 'Tons of sunlight!', 'Great layout on this amazing pre-war well kept apartment, right next to the Williamsburg Bridge and J M Z Marcy Ave stop as well as a walk to the L train at the Bedford Ave Stop!', 'Spacious bedrooms, with windows in each room including in kitchen and bathroom, Fits Queen size beds plus a desk!', 'Stainless steal updated kitchen appliances, Kitchen with windows!', 'Bathroom with windows!', 'Hardwood floors, high ceilings Pre-War detail and character kept!', 'Guarantors Accepted Pets Allowed * by approval', 'Showing by appointment - 1 months broker fee due at signing']
